section.title: Installing A Messaging Server
section.para: Install the messaging queue server, either Qpid or RabbitMQ.

You have the option of installing either Apache Qpid, usually for rpm based systems, or RabbitMQ, usually for Ubuntu systems. If Qpid is to be installed, refer to the Compute Administration Manual for configuration instructions, including adding rpc_backend=nova.rpc.impl_qpid to your nova.conf.
section.screen: sudo yum install openstack-utils memcached qpid-cpp-server
